subtitle: Rich mini pasties packed with saucy seafood make a great nibble.

method.text: Cream the cheese and butter together until blended. Sift in the flour and salt. Mix to a soft dough. Lightly knead until smooth. Wrap in cling film and chill for 1 hour.
Meanwhile, gently heat the remaining cream cheese, lemon juice and tomato puree in a small pan until melted. Stir in the crab meat and seasoning. Mix well.

Roll out the pastry on a lightly floured surface to 3mm thick. Cut into rounds with a 7 <sup>1</sup>/<sub>2</sub> cm cutter. Put a teaspoon of crab mixture on one side of each round. Brush the edges with beaten egg. Fold over and press to seal. Mark the edges with a fork.
Put the crescents on a lightly oiled baking tray. Brush with the remaining beaten egg. Make a hole in the centre of each to allow steam to escape.
Cook in the oven for 12-15 min, or until crisp and golden brown. Serve hot or cold.

title: Crab crescents
